SELECT T.* , NVL(B.SIMP_CNM, '합계') AS AUC_OBJ_DSC_NM FROM ( SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , SUM(NVL(A.SRA_SBID_AM, 0)) AS TOT_SRA_SBID_AM , TO_CHAR(NVL( SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM),0),'FM999,999,999,999') TOT_SRA_SBID_AM_FORMAT , COUNT(*) AS TOT_COW_CNT , GROUPING_ID(A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC) AS GROUPINGID FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC B ON A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUC_DT LIKE #{searchDateMy} ||'%'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo} AND TRMN_AMNNO = A.TRMN_AMNNO AND NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC)
AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = #{searchTrmnAmnNo}
AND A.NA_BZPLC = #{searchNaBzplc} AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' GROUP BY ROLLUP(A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC) HAVING GROUPING_ID(A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC) IN ('0', '1') ) T LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL B ON ( B.SIMP_TPC = 'AUC_OBJ_DSC' AND B.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '7' AND B.SIMP_C = T.AUC_OBJ_DSC ) ORDER BY T.GROUPINGID DESC, T.AUC_OBJ_DSC

SELECT T.* , DECODE(C.CLNTNM, NULL, '전체', C.CLNTNM) CLNTNM FROM ( SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , COUNT(*) AS TOT_COW_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
AND (A.NA_BZPLC, A.TRMN_AMNNO) IN (SELECT NA_BZPLC, TRMN_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo})
AND (A.TRMN_AMNNO) IN (#{searchTrmnAmnNo})
THEN 1 END) AS SBID_COW_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN B.ATDR_AM > 0 THEN 1 END) AS TOT_ATDR_CNT FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , TRMN_AMNNO , ATDR_AM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT, OSLP_NO, AUC_PRG_SQ, TRMN_AMNNO ORDER BY ATDR_DTM DESC) RNUM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_ATDR_LOG LOG WHERE 1=1
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo} AND LOG.NA_BZPLC = NA_BZPLC AND LOG.TRMN_AMNNO = TRMN_AMNNO)
AND LOG.TRMN_AMNNO = #{searchTrmnAmnNo}
) B ON A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO AND B.RNUM = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUC_DT LIKE #{searchDateMy} ||'%' GROUP BY ROLLUP(A.NA_BZPLC) HAVING GROUPING_ID(A.NA_BZPLC) IN ('0', '1') ) T LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC C ON T.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC WHERE 1=1 AND (T.SBID_COW_CNT > 0 OR T.TOT_ATDR_CNT > 0) ORDER BY T.NA_BZPLC DESC

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , COUNT(*) AS TOT_ENTRY_CNT
, COUNT(CASE WHEN (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN 1 END) AS TOT_MY_ENTRY_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN 1 END) AS TOT_SBID_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC != '22' AND (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN 1 END) AS TOT_FBID_CNT , TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM END)) AS AVG_MY_SBID_AM , TO_CHAR(NVL(TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM END)),0),'FM999,999,999,999') AS AVG_MY_SBID_AM_FORMAT , TRUNC(SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM END)) AS SUM_MY_SBID_AM , TO_CHAR(NVL(TRUNC(SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM END)),0),'FM999,999,999,999') AS SUM_MY_SBID_AM_FORMAT
, COUNT(CASE WHEN A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = '1' THEN 1 END) AS TOT_MY_ENTRY_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{searchFarmAmnno} THEN 1 END) AS TOT_SBID_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC != '22' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{searchFarmAmnno} THEN 1 END) AS TOT_FBID_CNT , TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{searchFarmAmnno} THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM END)) AS AVG_MY_SBID_AM , TO_CHAR(NVL(TRUNC(AVG(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{searchFarmAmnno} THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM END)),0),'FM999,999,999,999') AS AVG_MY_SBID_AM_FORMAT , TRUNC(SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{searchFarmAmnno} THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM END)) AS SUM_MY_SBID_AM , TO_CHAR(NVL(TRUNC(SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{searchFarmAmnno} THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM END)),0),'FM999,999,999,999') AS SUM_MY_SBID_AM_FORMAT
, TRUNC(AVG(DECODE(A.SEL_STS_DSC, '22', A.SRA_SBID_AM))) AS AVG_SBID_AM , TO_CHAR(NVL(TRUNC(AVG(DECODE(A.SEL_STS_DSC, '22', A.SRA_SBID_AM))),0),'FM999,999,999,999') AS AVG_SBID_AM_FORMAT , GROUPING_ID(A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC) AS GROUPINGID FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A WHERE 1=1 AND A.NA_BZPLC = #{searchNaBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT LIKE #{searchDateMy} ||'%' GROUP BY ROLLUP(A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC) HAVING GROUPING_ID(A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC) IN ('0','3') ORDER BY GROUPINGID DESC, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , DECODE(B.CLNTNM, NULL, '전체', B.CLNTNM) CLNTNM
, COUNT(CASE WHEN (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN 1 END) AS TOT_MY_ENTRY_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN 1 END) AS TOT_SBID_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC != '22' AND (A.FHS_ID_NO,A.FARM_AMNNO) IN (SELECT FHS_ID_NO,FARM_AMNNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE MB_INTG_NO = #{searchMbIntgNo}) THEN 1 END) AS TOT_FBID_CNT
, COUNT(CASE WHEN A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = '1' THEN 1 END) AS TOT_MY_ENTRY_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{searchFarmAmnno} THEN 1 END) AS TOT_SBID_CNT , COUNT(CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC != '22' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{searchFhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{searchFarmAmnno} THEN 1 END) AS TOT_FBID_CNT
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_BM_BZLOC B ON A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUC_DT LIKE #{searchDateMy} ||'%' GROUP BY ROLLUP(A.NA_BZPLC, B.CLNTNM) HAVING GROUPING_ID(A.NA_BZPLC, B.CLNTNM) IN ('0','3') ORDER BY A.NA_BZPLC DESC
